In the 70's the Nifty 50 was the Nasdaq 100.  Xerox, Kodak and Avon Products were the Apple, Google and Amazon of that era. In 2000, it was Qualcom, Cisco, EMC, Amgen, Micron Technology.  There have always been FANG stocks; only the names change, but never the final outcome.
